description: Brazilian hunk (and exclusive) Alex Clark is so determined to show Michael Lucas just what he can do that Michael himself pairs up with the sex pig for the ultimate test. title: Latin Hunk Alex Clark Opens His Ass for Porn King Michael Lucas
